Overview:
AEi Systems is an engineering analysis firm whose customers include nearly all the world’s leading aerospace/defense, automotive and IC manufacturers.

AEi Systems was established as an Analytical Engineering firm in 1995 to support the increasing demand for Worst Case Analysis in the Space market. Due to AEi Systems' core strengths in circuit analysis and simulation, AEi Systems now performs analysis for all sectors of the economy including automotive, nuclear, medical, maritime, military, and aerospace. 

In 2018, AEi Systems continues the long tradition of service to a demanding clientele. Our offerings continue to grow dramatically through repeat business and referrals.

AEi Systems maintains a talented staff of full-time analysts and a secure network of experts and consultants that enable us to deliver our products and services on time, under budget and to customer specification. 

AEi Systems offers Engineering Services including:
•	Worst-case Circuit Analysis for Power, RF, Digital, and Linear systems of 
        all types (http://www.aeng.com/wcca.htm)
•	Pre-WCCA Design Review or WCCA Review 
        (https://www.aeng.com/design_review.htm) / WCCA Bidding Support / 
        WCCA for Hybrids
•	Signal & Power Integrity Analysis (www.aeng.com/signal.htm and https://www.aeng.com/pi.htm)
•	All Electrical SDRLs: MTBF, FMEA/FMECA, Stress & Derating 
        (http://www.aeng.com/stress.htm), and Radiation Analysis 
        (https://www.aeng.com/radiation.htm)
•	Testing: Component and Circuits, Custom Test Board/EVM Development

If there is any interest for current or future programs, please feel free to call (310-216-1144) with any questions or visit http://www.AEiSystems.com/ for information about our Analog, Power, RF, and Digital Reliability Engineering Services.
